pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī saṁsaṭṭhā viharati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.3_0: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.4_0: “kathañhi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī saṁsaṭṭhā viharissati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.5_0: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī saṁsaṭṭhā viharati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.8_0: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī saṁsaṭṭhā viharissati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.10_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.11.1_0: “Yā pana bhikkhunī saṁsaṭṭhā vihareyya gahapatinā vā gahapatiputtena vā sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.13_0: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:1.14_0: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsīyamānā taṁ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṁ kusalaṁ;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.14_0: aññāhi bhikkhunīhi. Yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.35_0: Ayaṁ itthannāmā bhikkhunī saṁsaṭṭhā viharati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.37_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuniṁ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.40_0: Ayaṁ itthannāmā bhikkhunī saṁsaṭṭhā viharati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.42_0: Saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuniṁ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.43_0: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.47_0: Samanubhaṭṭhā saṅghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.1.48_0: khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.2.1_0: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.2.2_0: Dhammakamme vematikā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc36:2.2.3_0: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
